Board.name: note_names
Board.author: Beth Hadley (bethmhadley@gmail.com)
Board.title: Name that Note!
Board.description: Learn the names of the notes, in bass and treble clef, with the help of sounds and colors
Board.goal: To develop a good understanding of note position and naming convention. To prepare for the piano player and composition activity
Board.manual: The first level and the eleventh level introduce two different staffs with a C major scale. The following levels then quiz the player on note names. To help learn the names, the note pitches are played when the mouse is rolled over the note, and the pitch names can be color coded.
